snippet: Vermont’s Republican Party, once a major power, is alienated from the national brand, troubled by infighting and unable to offer a full slate of candidates for the primaries.
abstract: Vermont's Republican Party has been unable to offer full slate of candidates for statewide primaries; no Republicans have entered races for attorney general, auditor, secretary of state and treasurer; state party is alienated from national brand, troubled by infighting and stunted by low recruitment.
lead_paragraph: Vermont’s Republican Party, once a major power, is alienated from the national brand, troubled by infighting and unable to offer a full slate of candidates for the primaries.

headline.main: Vermont G.O.P. Finds Candidates in Short Supply
headline.print_headline: Vermont G.O.P. Finds Candidates in Short Supply
